text: - [Instructor] In order to display
all the notes in our application,

we'll need to create a
list view of all of them.
In order to do so,

we'll create a collection
within Amplify Studio.
Click Note UI, then click configure,
then click create collection.
We'll keep the name Note UI Collection
and now you'll be able to see a list
with some of your notes.
The preview will just show six.
I'm gonna add search and pagination.
I'm gonna change my page size to nine,
and I'm gonna change my layout to a grid.
I'll do three columns instead of two,

and then I'm going to
add 10 pixels of margin
on each side of my notes.
Note that if you only wanted to show notes

that met a condition,
you could set a filter

or a sort condition to put
them in a certain order.
Now we've created a collection
so that we can display all of our notes.
